original_text: Hashabiah and Jeshaiah also came. They belonged to the clan of Levi's son, Merari. 20 men from their family came with them. 20 220 temple servants also came. King David had first chosen this group to help the Levites with their work. We made a list of all their names.
korean_text: 하사뱌와 므라리 자손 중 여사야와 그의 형제와 그의 아들들 이십 명을 데려오고

sentences.original_text: They belonged to the clan of Levi's son, Merari
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 레위의 아들 므라리의 씨족에 속했습니다

sentences.original_text: 20 men from their family came with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 가족 중 20명이 그들과 함께 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: King David had first chosen this group
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕이 먼저 이 그룹을 선택했습니다

sentences.original_text: to help the Levites with their work
We made a list of all their names
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그들의 모든 이름의 목록을 만들었습니다
